title: DOI regex
author: Simon Goring
description: Matches DOIs in papers, described in https://www.crossref.org/blog/dois-and-matching-regular-expressions/

title: NSF Award Numbers
author: Simon Goring
description: Very general search for reporting of NSF award numbers.

title: References to supplemental material
author: Simon Goring
description: Very general search for a reference to supplemental material.

title: Find Degrees Minutes Seconds Coordinates
author: Simon Goring
description: Attempts to match geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude) reported as DMS.

title: Age ranges BP
author: Simon Goring
description: Age ranges reported as something BP.

title: Find Decimal Degrees
author: Simon Goring
description: Attempts to match geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude) reported as decimal degrees.

title: HTML regex
author: Simon Goring
description: Matches any http URLs that are reported in papers.

title: Numeric age regex with yr
author: Simon Goring
description: Matches DOIs in papers, described in https://www.crossref.org/blog/dois-and-matching-regular-expressions/
